title: Ranked Rewards Missing?
body: So I've noticed that Riot has been releasing the end of season rewards and I've gotten everything except for the invite and friend request flair. Is that still a thing? Or has Riot decided to completely scrap it. Thanks!

replies.body: Curious,  you should get if for gold or above. I'd send in a support ticket if I were you. Now that I think about it, last season I only remember ever seeing the gold ones, maybe the plat+ ones are bugged? (Or maybe I just have a terrible memory for such things) Support should be able to help you out at any rate.
Invite and friend request Flair? Have you got an image of what you think you are entitled to?
